src:
Januari, Chelsea Kejar Wilfried Zaha
05 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Klub Premier League, Chelsea diberitakan ingin meningkatkan daya gedor tim mereka di bulan Januari nanti. The Blues diberitakan bakal merekrut Wilfried Zaha dari Crystal Palace.
Musim ini, Chelsea bisa dikatakan tampil di luar ekspektasi. Bermodalkan pemain-pemain muda berbakat, Frank Lampard mampu membawa The Blues menempati posisi empat besar EPL musim ini.
Lampard sendiri diberitakan belum puas dengan performa timnya. Untuk itu ia ingin mencari tambahan amunisi untuk lini serang The Blues.
Dilansir Express, Chelsea sudah mengunci satu target trasnfer di bulan Januari nanti. Mereka ingin merekrut Wilfried Zaha dari Crystal Palace.

Mengapa Chelsea tertarik merekrut Zaha? SImak informasinya di bawah ini.
text:
January, Chelsea chases Wilfried Zaha
05 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Premier League club, Chelsea are reported to want to increase the bang on their team in January. The Blues are reported to be recruiting Wilfried Zaha from Crystal Palace.
This season, Chelsea can be said to appear beyond expectations. With its talented young players, Frank Lampard is able to bring the Blues into the top four EPL positions this season.
Lampard himself was reported not satisfied with the performance of his team. For that he wants to find additional ammunition to attack the Blues.
Reported by Express, Chelsea has locked a transfer target in January. They want to recruit Wilfried Zaha from Crystal Palace.

Why is Chelsea interested in recruiting Zaha? The information is below.
